001package imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters;
002
003import imagingbook.lib.image.access.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
004import imagingbook.lib.math.VectorNorm.NormType;
005
006public abstract class BilateralF {
007        
008        private BilateralF() {
009        }
010        
011        public static class Parameters {
012                /** Sigma (width) of domain filter */
013                public double sigmaD = 2;               
014                /** Sigma (width) of range filter */
015                public double sigmaR = 50;
016                /** Distance norm to use between color vectors */
017                public NormType colorNormType = NormType.L2;
018                /** Out-of-bounds strategy */
019                public OutOfBoundsStrategy obs = OutOfBoundsStrategy.NEAREST_BORDER;
020        }
021        
022        // ------------------------------------------------------
023        
024        protected static float gauss(double d, double sigmaR2) {
025                return (float) Math.exp(-(d * d) / (2 * sigmaR2));
026        }
027        
028        // This returns the weights for a Gaussian range kernel (scalar version):
029//      protected static float similarityGauss(float a, float b, double sigmaR2) {
030//              //double dI = a - b;
031//              return gauss(a - b, sigmaR2);
032//              //return (float) Math.exp(-(dI * dI) / (2 * sigmaR2));
033//      }
034        
035//      @SuppressWarnings("unused")
036//      // for better efficiency: pre-tabulated version of the range kernel - CHECK!
037//      private float[] makeRangeKernel(double sigma, int K) {
038//              int size = K + 1 + K;
039//              float[] rangeKernel = new float[size]; //center cell = kernel[K]
040//              double sigma2 = sigma * sigma;
041//              for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
042//                      double x = K - i;
043//                      rangeKernel[i] =  (float) Math.exp(-0.5 * (x*x) / sigma2);
044//              }
045//              return rangeKernel;
046//      }
047
048}
